item.description:
I suspect that many of you will not want to drive to the Chilis in Glastonbury
For a Meet Up. On Saturday, March 1, I did look for a more local area
Restaurant for you to go to a Meet Up earlier in the day.

The new SBC over by Hamden Plaza looked like some place that
Some of you would want to go to.

I later read that it is a location that a New In Town
Will be going to next week. So if any of you are
In the New In Two Meet Up group, then you will be going there
Weeks before we go there. Maybe those of you who do go to
SBC next week can write on the message board what you
Thought of it.

http://newintown.meet...

newintown.meetup.com/531/calendar/7318621/?gj=ej3&a=cn1_cn2

So at 2:30 on Sunday, March 30,
Lets Meet At the SBC in Hamden.

Hamden is a new location for SBC, so look at the bottom of
This link for driving directions of the Hamden location.

http://www.southportb...

www.southportbrewing.com/directions/index.php

You can click on other links within the site to read
More about SBC.

After a couple of hours at SBC, then I will be leaving for
Our Chilis in Glastonbury Meet Up.

Coffee Talk Assistant Organizer

http://coffee.meetup....

coffee.meetup.com/397/

Unknown Zone Organizer

http://conspiracy.mee...

conspiracy.meetup.com/83/

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: I will bring a copy of Dahlonega Haunts with me.
item.why: Who wants to have brunch in Hamden on a Sunday.
item.name: Hamden SBC Lets Make C Mean Coffee
